6d78a4bea;[android] Allow simple playback of ringtones without adversly affecting the user's current playback and incidental stop/play status fix for file lists (affects both ringtone and music playback): -If something is playing and a ringtone is to be played the current played music will be paused -If a ringtone is playing and music playback is resumed/started then the ringtone will be stopped -Only one ringtone can be played at the same time. Starting new playback will stop the old one. -Clicking a ringtone that is being played will stop the playback -Navigating out of the fragment or changing the tab carusel will stop playback of a ringtone. (User can no longer see the stop button, so it's stopped for him)
